description:
We are a wholesaler of consumer electronics.

Role Description
This is a full-time work from home position that requires daily receiving, sorting, and shipping of packages using FedEx. The Shipping Specialist will be responsible for shipping & receiving, packing, inventory control, and other related tasks to ensure efficient logistics operations.

Qualifications

Shipping & Receiving, Packing experience.
Residing in greater Los Angeles Area.
Drivers License and a Motor Vehicle as occasionally packages need to be dropped off/picked up.
Experience in inventory control
Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment
Attention to detail and organizational skills
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
Capability to work independently and remotely
Previous experience in logistics or warehouse operations is a plus
1099 W9
